Role: AWS Developer or Architect (Handson Scala Exp)Location: New York, NY- onsiteDuration: Contract to HireMode: VideoJob Details: Role Description:Job Title: Scala and AWS DeveloperExperience: 3+ yearsLocation: [Specify location or remote]Job Type: [Full-time/Contract]Job Summary:We are looking for a skilled Scala and AWS Developer with 3+ years of hands-on experience in designing, developing, and maintaining scalable cloud-based solutions.
